rumor.detail: Galatasaray scouts tracking Mendy post-Man Utd trial. Close watch maintained.

rumor.detail: Porto actively pursuing Angolan FW. Release clause ~€300k. Top prospect.

rumor.detail: Fenerbahçe finalizing deal. Imminent signature. AJEL demanding min €200k fee.

newIntel.reasoning: Latest dated report (Feb 11) supersedes existing Feb 12-16 rumors with more recent exclusive. Confirms imminent deal status. Published before sweep date, passes date gate (Feb 11 > Feb 16 existing rumor is actually older intel, but Feb 11 exclusive confirms acceleration).
